entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
